title: Harassment from another player
body:
I have received harassment from another player who I suspect jumped on a separate account to harass me. I have no recollection of flaming/abusing anyone on this game so I'm not sure why he sent me this message. The account that sent the message was: *name removed* (also an offensive name) but I do not believe this is their main account they play on. I find this behavior to be unacceptable and I hope there can be some sort of punishment on all their accounts and not just his backup accounts. 
I also have a problem requesting a ticket for this issue. As i select the category to finish the ticket, the Submit button disappears.

replies.body:
Notice all how rather than punish the player in question riot simply redacts the name from the text.

Not only denying this harassed player his justice.

But denying the community the chance to defend themselves.

And you wonder why league of legends is a breeding ground for toxicity.
woops sorry, i will know for next time. thanks for pointing that out

If you send a Log in a ticket Riot are more likely to punish, The reason is because the report system is automated and will only punish if there is a high number of reports for the same thing to stop people getting banned from someone whom is just salt reporting
Report them after everything report them every single time for harassment. If they see like fifty reports they're gonna think, we should probobly do something
